titles.title: Strengthen the Earned Income Tax Credit Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to strengthen the earned income tax credit.
Strengthen the Earned Income Tax Credit Act of 2005

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Strengthen the Earned Income Tax Credit Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) make permanent the reduction in the marriage penalty applicable to the earned income tax credit; (2) increase the percentage of such credit for families with three or more children; (3) reduce the phase-out of such credit for individuals without children; and (4) make permanent provisions treating combat pay as earned income for purposes of calculating such credit.
